Summary: First of all this hotel is locate near the 55 freeway , you can head south to Newport Beach or John Wayne airport or San Diego  also if you head north you can go to Disney land or Los Angeles , South  Coast Plaza is about 3 miles ,  The staff is very friendly , the room is quiet and clean , the breakfast is hot and cook for your order , they also has shuttle bus to airport and Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  I am happy you enjoyed your stay with us and hope you will be back soon.

Summary Heading: Great staff, not so great location
Summary: Stayed here 1 night because any & all hotels around disneyland where booked by the time I tried to reserve a room.  I would have considered this a good place if it weren't such a distance from the one place I wanted to visit while on my stay.  The room was fine, the people staffing the front desk could not have been more helpful.  My netbook got locked somehow & I could not even enter a password - they fixed it in 2 minutes!  Breakfast was not great, it was a cooked hot breakfast but the pancake gagged me because it was undercooked.  The breakfast room was very crowded 45 - 60 minutes before breakfast time ended.  I let a guy share my table who was standing up trying to eat!   I'll gladly have a breakfast of decent baked goods & some yogurt & fresh fruit over poorly cooked hot
Manager Response: Dear guest, thank you for your review.  I am sorry you that you were unable to stay closer to Disneyland.  I hope you will give us a chance next time you are in the area, I know that during the time you were with us we were very busy here with spring break hence our breakfast is always busy during the busy season.

Summary: Nice hotel, good location and nice staff. Had a good breakfast, nice choices. Room are okay, clean and quiet, condidering its not to far from airport. Bed could have been a littel softer, shower nice and clean. over all it was a good choice.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us.  I am happy you enjoyed your stay with us and hope you will visit us again soon.

Summary Heading: Wonderful location !! good value for traveler
Summary: Fr: MEIDINE DONG-PHO (period Feb, 10 -- 14, then 16 -- 23rd/ 2013) room # 144 Twins bed. We stayed here again and again . Each time we had always a pleasant stay at Best Western Plus -Orange County Airport North. Near to airport but this is a quite hotel , good for vacation!! Room was big, very clean & comfortable with big screen LCD, good ACond., strong wifi , coffe maker, microwave oven, fridge. It was very convenient for travelers with easy Freeway access I-55. Great security for parking. Good breakfast with hot meal made to order, fresh fruits, tea , coffee ... Staffs were helpfull but weren't not friendly, they only dit their job.  Surely we will stay here for our next trip.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for your repeat business and your glowing reviews.  We strive to provide the best customer service to all our guests.  We look forward to having you stay with us next time.

Summary Heading: Good Value for the Business Traveler
Summary: Had a pleasant stay here at the BW Santa Ana.  Structure is old school - but they did a nice job rehabbing the rooms and common areas.  Room was NOT dated - tasteful amenities, very clean with comfortable beds and bedding, flat screen, and strong wifi.  Staff was very accommodating. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear guest, thank you for taking the time to write a review.  I am happy you enjoyed your stay with us and hope you will be back soon.

Summary: I was a little nervous staying so close to the airport but it was a very quiet hotel.  Didn't hear much if any airplane noise.  Also didn't hear much noise from neighbors next door or upstairs.  Very convenient to Orange Co airport which is why we chose this hotel.  Easy freeway access on and off and plenty of amenities at the hotel and nearby.  Made to order breakfast from limited menu was also a plus; much better than customary continental fare.  Would stay here again if the need arises.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We are in a very quiet area so you will not have to worry about any noise and the Orange County Airport closes at 11PM so you will not be hearing planes fly over all night long.  We hope you will be back soon.

Summary Heading: Best Western Plus Orange County Airport North
Summary: I was pleasantly surprised -- I usually stay at a Marriott but was out in Santa Ana for a AYSO Coach class.  Best Western was recommended (and covered by the region) so I decided to try it.  First, the staff was friendly and warm.  The room was a good size, bed and pillows were excellent, and the free breakfast in the morning was far superior to Marriott.  I have decided to re-think my business travel to see if all Best Western's meet the standards set by this one.
Manager Response: Thank you for your glowing review, I am happy that you gave us a chance and stay with us on your visit to Orange County.  We hope that you will be back with us again soon.

Summary: Very nice hotel to stay wether you are doing business or vacationing in the area.   The rooms are nicely done with granite tops, comfortable beds, nice pillows and comforters, refridgerator, microwave, digital heat/air unit and LG panel TV.   Lots of nice little extras you just don't get in a room in this price range. Things like Pantene shampoo and conditioner, reasonable coffee and excellent wireless coverage all included in the room price.   Parking is really convenient right outside the doors on the first level. Stairs to the second seem to be in the right place. Nice little courtyard with excellent pool with nice landscaping. Distance is about 5-7 minutes from John Wayne airport and they do have a shuttle.   The breakfast is by far the best breakfast of any of the hotels I
Manager Response: Thank you for your very detail and great review of your stay with us.  We hope that you will be back with us soon.

Summary: My husband was working in Santa Ana and I got to come along.  The room was nice except the bed was not the most comfy and on most of the TV channels there were two fuzzy lines.  Would stay here again because the price was right!
Manager Response: Deart Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  I hope you enjoyed your stay with us.  We have finally finish the cable tv lineup with Time Warner Cable, we now have all HD channels, so our reception is crystal clear now.

Summary: Sitting on a hotel row, Best Western Plus is a standout not necessarily for being posh, but for its value.  Check in was efficient and effortless (I arrived early in the morning and they got me into my room right away.)  The room was clean and fresh, not looking too warn at all.  Wireless was fast and reliable.  Breakfast options were extensive enough for a buffet.  The exercise room was a disappointment, but to be fair I just needed a treadmill and they have one.  I didn't use the jacuzzi, but it looked inviting.  Back to the value.  If BW were to increase their price more than 10 bucks, I would go elsewhere.  I got a good deal for the money, and will return.
Manager Response: Dear JTL61, thank you for your review.  We strive to provide the best value for your money.  We hope you will be back with us soon.

Summary: We stayed here for our disneyland vacation.  We had around 4 or 5 rooms.  No one complained about anything about the rooms.  The only thing is I thought it was a little closer to the park but was a little farther.  But we got to ride around town and still had a great time.  Will stay again if we are in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Connie K, thank you for your review.  We are very happy you had such a wonderful time with us.  Hope you had a great time at Disney Land.

Summary: We were pleasantly surprised by this hotel.  Clean tidy rooms.  Breakfast included (scrambled eggs, toast, hash-browns, fruit, and juices), the ladies at the kitchen were very nice.   Helpful staff, and ample parking.  Convenient location (driving) to South Coast Plaza, C-55, C-22, I-5 and I-405.  SNA airport is just a hop away.  The immediate neighborhood is surrounded by hotels, so you defiantly need a vehicle to drive around.
Manager Response: Dear Dimashqi2020, thank you for your glowing review.  We hope you will be back soon.  I will tell our breakfast staff of your experience during your stay with us.

Summary: Between Christmas and the last few days, we stayed at this hotel twice. Both times we were very pleased with the staff, the room and the "free" breakfast. This is not a 5 star hotel, but very nice for the price. Clean room, front desk personnel were very nice and responsive, and the breakfast was better than most "free" breakfasts that we have had. We would stay here again in a heart beat. Close to the airport so it was easy to depart.
Manager Response: Dear GregandJanet, we appreciate you taking the time to write a review.  We welcome all feedback and continue to provide the best customer service to all our guests. We are always happy to read that one of our guests has enjoyed their stay with us.  We look forward to your next visit when you return the area again.

Summary: Convenient to airport. Room was comfortable, clean, and quiet. Front desk personnel very cordial.  Unfortunately hotel does not have a shuttle service to airport before 6am so cab service was required..
Manager Response: Dear Best Western traveler, we appreciate you taking the time to write a review.  We always welcome all feedback and continue to provide the best customer service to all our guests. We are always happy to read that one of our guests has enjoyed their stay with us.  We look forward to your next visit when you return the area again.

Summary: We have been to this hotel twice now. It is close to UC Irvine where our granddaughter is a student. We also have friends in San Diego that we love to visit and in LA. This location is great for all. The proximity to the airport and freeways is a bonus. I like the CLEAN rooms and hot baths and quiet at night so you can sleep. My husband who eats like a lumberjack loves their full breakfast and strong good coffee. They even have some herbal teas for a hot cup before bed. I recommend this place for families, couples or singles.
Manager Response: Dear Aggie T, thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us.  It is good to have a happy repeat guest staying with us again.  We hope you will be back with us again soon.  I will make sure our staff knows we have another satisfied guest.

Summary Heading: Perfect hotel for business in OC
Summary: I am in OC at least every other month for business and I always stay here.  The rooms are reasonably priced, the location is great (at the intersection off 55 and 405 freeways), wi-fi is free, and there are restaurants and shopping nearby (though you need a car for this).  But it is the service that keeps me coming back.  These people are friendly, helpful and they actually remember me.  They are also honest.  I left diamond earrings in my room at checkout on one visit and they were turned in to lost and found by housekeeping.  Wow!  I also feel safe here and as a woman traveling alone, that is very important.  Breakfast is hot and its convenient to grab a bite before heading out.  Microwave, coffee maker and fridge in each room which is super convenient to store bottled water,
Manager Response: Dear traveler, thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us!  I am very happy that you had such a wonderful time with us and you enjoy your time here at our hotel.  We strive to provide clean and comfortable rooms to all our guests, and also provide a good breakfast each morning.  I will inform our staff regarding your praises.  We hope you will be back soon.

Summary Heading: Nice surprise. Nice rooms, quiet and good breakfast
Summary: I tried several other hotels in this area and will be making this hotel my regular business hotel.  Convenient locations, nice rooms and a good breakfast.  Free Wifi is a plus.  Quick check-in and check-out.
Manager Response: Dear JCH87506, thank you for writing such a great review of your stay with us.  I am very happy that you find our hotel such a nice surprise.  We make it our job to provide superior customer service and make sure all of our rooms are clean and comfortable.  I hope that you will be back soon.

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel many times and my experience has always been the same - clean, friendly, quiet, and oh so comfortable. The beds and bedding are great - just like expensive hotels. I'll be back.
Manager Response: Dear Christy M, thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us.  I am glad you had such a great stay with us and you had a great night's sleep.  We strive to provide clean and comfortable rooms to all and will continue to do so in the future.  We Hope you will be back very soon.

Summary: Lots of good points to this hotel - convenient for the airport and the freeway to the coasts.  Free hot breakfast was OK, but the breakfast room is very cramped so it is a case of 'eat up and get out' rather than lingering as there is always someone waiting for a table.  Free wi-fi was appreciated as was the business centre equipped with terminals and printers for boarding passes.  It seemed quite a long hike from the front desk to our room but there is a lift, which helps.  Room was pretty large, with a sitting area, but very dark.  Bathroom was also fine, it's always nice to be able to have a soak in a bath as an alternative to having a shower.  Bed was large and quite comfortable though it was a case of two pillows were too much but one wasn't sufficient as another guest also
Manager Response: Dear 5113, thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us.  I am very happy you enjoyed your stay with us and how you enjoyed your room.  I am sorry that the breakfast was so busy during your stay with us.  The winter season during December is very busy as we have alot of families going to Disneyland during this time and the breakfast will be busy.

Summary Heading: Very close to John Wayne Airport; free hot breakfast
Summary: I wanted a clean, safe, quiet hotel close to the airport with breakfast included, and I got that. The staff was the best part--very helpful and polite. Because I didn't rent a car and was dependent on relatives for transportation, I was at a bit of a disadvantage when it came to meals. The hotel doesn't serve lunch or dinner, and I was not aware of restaurants within walking distance for someone with bad knees. There was a small refrigerator in the room, however, so I could bring food back and keep it cold, then warm it up in the microwave in the room.   The room was clean and quiet. Liked the free Internet. I was disappointed that my TV did not have a PBS channel.   The hotel offers a free shuttle to the airport, and shuttle service to South Coast Plaza can be arranged.
Manager Response: Dear travelerduo, thank you for your praise and taking the time to review your stay with us.  We do our best to provide everyone with clean rooms and we do our best to keep our property up to date.  Please make sure to stay with us the next time you are here.

Summary: Free breakfast every morning and free internet.  The place was quite and decent.  Just remember it's not a five star hotel.  It was close to Newport beach, Fashion Island and Balboa area.  Just a short drive.  The maids kept the room clean and even picked up our kids toys and placed them neatly on the bed.  They are awesome!!  The weather was great when we traveled (July)
Manager Response: Dear Michelle C, Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay with us.  I am very happy you enjoyed your stay and will tell our housekeeping staff that you were very happy with the service you recieved while you stayed with us.

Summary: Great service, clean and comfy room, good breakfast - can't beat the price with a made to order breakfast, free internet and parking - there were a handful of ants in the bathroom but to me those are no big deal
Manager Response: Dear azbtrfly, thank you for taking the time to write a review. We welcome all feedback and  will contiune to provide exceptional customer service to all our guests. I am happy you enjoyed your stay with us and hope you will come back and stay with us next time.

Summary: Let me just say up front, for those who are only skimming these reviews: FREE PARKING, FREE INTERNET, and FREE BREAKFAST. Along with the low, low prices, these were the deciding factors in choosing this hotel.  This clean, friendly, no-frills hotel surpassed my expectations. The room was nice - spacious and neat but a bit dark. It had both a refrigerator AND microwave. The bathroom and sink are separate - good for families - and the bathroom was immaculate and in good condition, unlike a lot of other more expensive hotels.  Breakfast was pretty darn good. No, it's not restaurant quality but it's not stale muffins either. There was a pool and apparently a fitness room, neither of which I tried. Parking is ample, and there's an elevator for those who can't do the stairs.  There
Manager Response: Dear Vero600, thank you for taking the time to write a review. We welcome all feedback and  will contiune to provide exceptional customer service to all our guests. I am happy you enjoyed your stay with us and hope you will come back and stay with us next time.

Summary: Well presented and well priced hotel with an excellent selection for breakfast for the price of the room.  Responsive workers who excel in customer service.  Hotel offers free delivery to the airport in Orange County.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review for our property.  I am very pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us and hope you will be back soon.

Summary Heading: blast from the past but really not bad.
Summary: Imagine an old fashioned motor court but built more recently. No rooms are far from a car parking space so good if you have tons of luggage or cant bear to be away from your vehicle for long. Rooms are classic motel - open door to the beds, bathroom and other amenities to the back.  They obviously cater for multi-day stays. Love free wifi.  They really have provided all the right stuff to make this a good option, but its been done in a sort of low security jail sort of way. Coffee maker and hair dryer are fixed to the wall. Large flat screen, micro and good size fridge (not one of those "used to be a minibar but we couldn't make money at it").   They have that small pillow thing, why do I want four small pillows per bed? They added those curved shower curtain rails so you don't
Manager Response: Dear Traveler2504, thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We welcome all feedback and contiune to provide exceptional customer service to all our guests.  I am happy you enjoyed your stay with us.  I hope you will come back and stay with us next time.

Summary: All rooms appear to be an exterior corridor motel style with the door, window and A/C on the walkway wall.  Room was clean and rates were about the same as other similar locations in the immediate area, most of which were of the same style, including the LQ, and a couple of Comfort hotels.  The rooms around the pool, of which there are not many, have a decent courtyard view, but the rest face the parking lot in back in two parallel buildings with parking in the middle.  The room & breakfast room was clean, and amenities were above average.  Free wifi is always a huge plus.
Manager Response: Dear Ctofer, thank you for taking the time to give us a review of your stay here.  We hope to have you stay with us again in the future.  We are always making improvement to the property here to keep up to date with the times.

Summary: We recently stayed at this property for one night this past weekend. Free parking,Internet and breakfast along with a great rate makes this a fantastic value.  The room was clean and had everything we needed including a fridge and microwave.  You are about 15 to 20 minutes fromthe beach and Disneyland by car. The only issue was the pool was closed and completely empty during our stay.  If you are visiting soon be sure to ask about the pool.
Manager Response: Dear btworld, thank you for your review of your stay with us.  I am glad you enjoyed your stay with us and hope that you will continue to stay with us in the future.  I will also notify our staff of your review and we will continue to provide this level of service to all our guests.

Summary: Very clean hotel, the staff at ALL times were polite, friendly and willing to do their job in making sure you have a pleasant stay. The room was very comfortable, had granite counter tops, had refrigerator, microwave, flat screen tv, it was great, the shower was an old one but kept clean and it good condition. Hotel is located right off the 55 fwy and close to airport, Disneyland, 10 min from Newport beach.  Zacuzzi was great as well as the pool, great temperature for both. For the room price we paid included breakfast and free parking. Awesome deal. I will stay here again
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your review of your stay with us.  I am very pleased you had such a wonderful stay with us.  Thank you for all your feedback and choosing our hotel for your travel needs, we hope to see you back here very soon!

Summary: Booked a room with 2 queen beds. It's clean even though it's dated. The beds are firm. The wall AC is not loud but wish that it would stop blowing air when it's set under "Auto". Free wifi internet. Connection is a bit slow but it's secured. They gave you password and access code, even though it's the same for everyone in the hotel but at least it's not totally unsecured.   The room comes with a microwave, a refrigerator, coffee maker, and hair dryer. Big flat screen TV with limited channels. They have 2 luggage racks which is a big plus since most hotels still only provide you with 1 luggage rack. Unless you're a solo traveler, most people always end up placing their luggage on the floor.    There's a self laundry area close to the pool. 2 coin operated washers and dryers. Each
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write such a well detailed review of your stay with us.  I will inform our staff of your experience and we will continue to provide superior customer service to all of our guests.  I hope you will stay with us next time you are back in this area.

Summary: Tried 2 others on Hotel Terrace Drive and this is the best by far. No problems with the wireless internet access, rooms just as described with very comfortable beds, clean and air conditioned. A big thank you for the cooked to order breakfasts and the service in the dining room. Good to have the Avis car hire franchise in the hotel over the road (Quality Inn). Front desk satf very helpful and pleasant. TV not so good for foreigners as all US tv only carries US news and programming - the natives dont realise that there is life outside the US. Shopping in the District Mall is now fully let and only a short drive away. Convenient for the main road to the coast and beaches.
Manager Response: Dear AndyofCambridge,  Thank you for your glowing review of our property, we strive to provide all our customers with this level of service each and every time they stay with us.  I will inform our staff of your reviews and have them continue the great jobs of providing great customer service to all guests.  We hope to see you next time you are in this area.

Summary: Stayed here a few times.  Always loved the place.  It's the little things that count: Quiet A/C unit, quiet bathroom fan.  Separate sink from the bathroom and plenty of room to spread out. The remote for the TV was unique, never seen one like it before.  Easy to clean and had only what you needed for buttons.     Staff has always been fast, friendly and efficient.  Never had a problem needing fixing, but even met the maintenance people and found them smiling and happy to know everything was working.   Also the lighting was the type that would turn off after a time if no movement was sensed in the room.
Manager Response: Dear Vegastourist,  Thank you so very much for sharing your experience about your stay with us on TripAdvisor. We truly value your feedback. We are glad that you noticed small details like our clean remote or sensor lightning etc. It is very rewarding to know that guests appreciate such small changes we implemented in order to provide our guest with superior customer service.    We hope  to see you again in future!  Thank You!  Vibi Bhakta

Summary: We stayed 2 nights at the end of August, 2012.  Our room was very clean.  The furniture was new and included a fridge and microwave.  The tub and toilet were in a separate room from the sink, which made getting ready in the morning easier.  Our king room had a loveseat and coffee table.  How nice to not have to sit on the bed to watch TV.    The breakfast was good.  Fresh, cooked to order food, not powdered eggs out of a warming dish.  I would recommend they serve a higher quality ham (maybe Canadian bacon) than the formed ham slice we were served.  There was good fresh fruit too, along with muffins and pastries.    It seems to be a Best Western policy to ask guests to keep their bath towels rather than having them replaced every day.  That's ok with me, but I wish they would
Manager Response: Dear AuntieFlo!  We are glad to hear that you appreciated our room amenities. Thank you for giving us your valuable feedback along with some suggestions to consider. At Best Western Plus Orange County Airport, We try to conserve  Water and energy in our efforts to Go Green. We encourage our guest to leave their towels on the towel bars or shower rod  if they would like to re use them. May be we can consider providing additional bars so that the guest do not have to use the same towel bar used to stock fresh towel.   Thank you for reviewing us on TripAdvisor. We hope to see you soon!   Vibi Bhakta

Summary Heading: It was nice, but they need to extend gym/pool/breakfast hours
Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights this August and it was fairly nice.  It was clean, the shower head had an extender so it was nice and high (especially if you are tall), the bed was super soft (could be too soft if you like firm beds), and the tv had a remote that was in a special case so it could be wiped clean easily (a nice touch).  The pool was nice, but it closes at 10pm and so does the gym, so we didn't even get to use them.  It sucks because when you are on vacation (or other get away), you usually don't get back to your room until late.  That said, the free breakfast was pretty nice. They gave you meal tickets and it consisted of real food (eggs, waffles, fresh fruit, pastries, etc.)  But, the breakfast stops at 9:30am and we didn't even get to use it on our second day
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking some time out to review us on TripAdvisor. We truly value your feedback. We are glad that you liked our bed. We are sorry that you  were not able to enjoy our pool and hot tub because of the time restriction. We will definitely  consider the possibility of extending our pool hours, if it will not cause any disturbance to our guests who are early to bed.  We hope you enjoyed rest of your stay and that you will give us another opportunity to serve you in future.   Thank You! Vibi Bhakta

Summary: Well the kids and I and the wife packed up the car and headed to Orange County to go fishing in Newport. We had made reservations a month or so ago, and were excited about the trip. Upon arrival we were told it was$10 each extra for kids, but the front desk associate waived it for this time. Very cool. Got our keys  went to the room and it was very clean. Our room was open, airy and nice. I was on the second floor, but it was quiet. Beds were comfortable. All in all I would recommend this place. Thank you for a nice stay. (yes we caught fish in Newport)
Manager Response: Thank you for your praise and taking the time to give us a review of your stay.  I am happy you had such a wonderful time staying with us and also your success in your fishing trip in newport beach.  We hope you will be back next time when you are in the area, remember there are other things to do in SoCal than just fishing, so hopefully you will be back soon.

Summary: My husband and I stayed separately and together at this property for over 15 yrs. Its our home away from home when we travel for business. We have written Best Western corporate several times singing praises. The property is always immaculate and being updated. The bed is the most comfortable compared with the other hotels we used to frequent (Hilton, Marriot, to name a few), the bedding is warm and cozy, the furnishings modern; and most of all, the hotel is extremely quiet (no sound from neighbors and the elevators). The staff is truly outstanding and accommodating. To top it off, the hot breakfast is like none other--eggs to order, waffles, pancakes, hashbrowns, to name a few. Other hotels claim to have hot breakfasts, but they are usually pre-packaged. Because of the way we
Manager Response: I am very happy to have such a loyal and longtime customer continue to stay with us through out the years.  We are always continuing to make improvements to our property and still provide the highest level of customer service to all our guests.  I thank you for taking the time to give us such a great review and we will do our best to provide the highest level of service which has kept you coming back to us through out the years.

Summary: Booked this hotel for less than $100 online and was pleasantly surprised.  When I first parked my car I found a mop bucket lying in a bush next to the maintenance room and I thought we were in trouble, but instead we found a very clean room.  They free breakfast in the morning was excellent, including made to order eggs, waffles, hash browns, etc.  Not something you see much anymore.  So for $100 we got a room near the airport, a pool, and breakfast for a family of 3.  GREAT DEAL!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write such a glowing review of our property.  We always strive to provide superior customer care and clean rooms to all our guests.  We had a very busy summer season this year and are very happy you enjoy your stay with us.  I am happy you enjoyed the breakfast and will hope to see you next summer!

Summary: The room was very clean and the bed was quite comfortable.  The breakfast in the morning was very appetizing and the equivalent of a nice diner.  The price for the stay was very reasonable and I would book it again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for staying with us at Best Western Plus Orange county and taking time out to review us on TripAdvisor.   We are happy to know that you enjoyed your stay with us and liked our Breakfast Services. We continously strive to improve our amenites and services to meet our guest expectations and it is rewarding when guest appreciates it.   We hope to see you again in future!   Thank You!  Vibi Bhakta

Summary Heading: An excellent value and much better than you would expect
Summary: I stayed here again after staying here a few months ago.  After a recent BAD experience at the LaQuinta across the street (a real dump; don't understand how they rate so high), I was happy to be in this hotel. The biggest plus is how professional the staff are and how unusually clean and well maintained the property is. Every morning the walkways are cleaned, the pool guy is cleaning out the pool, and the breakfast is humming with attentive service and a good cooked to order breakfast from the staff. It's just about the cleanest and most professionally run hotel in this class that I've seen.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to write a review regarding your recent stay at our property.  I am very happy to know you had such a wonderful stay with us.  Your business is very important to us and we value your feedback. By telling us what you liked about your stay and how we can improve, you are helping us deliver a superior experience for you and other guests in the future. We hope you will come back and see us again soon.

Summary: I was nervous when we checked in because I did not realize that this was an "outdoor corridor" motel and they are usually noisy. Fortunately things were nice and quiet after a reasonable hour and I slept just fine. There were a lot of families at the motel and my room was right over the pool so the fact that it was fairly quiet was especially surprising.   The breakfast was ok - made to order eggs/bacon/sausage/toast. There was a selection of rolls but I couldn't eat any of those as I am allergic to wheat. I was disappointed that there was no yogurt but I guess you can't ask for everything.   My room was a bit dated in decor and smelled just slightly musty but was clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you staying with us at Best Western Plus Orange County Airport North and finding time out of your busy schedule to review us online on TripAdvisor. We hope you enjoyed your stay with us.  We truly  value your feedback and i want to assure you that we will continue to reveiw our services and amenities and implement the changes to meet our guest expectaitons.   We hope to see you again in future!  Thank You!  Vibi Bhakta

Summary: good, clean and comfortable rooms. the made to order breakfast was just the icing in the cake on our stay! area was safe and hotel offers shuttle to the airport.
Manager Response: Dear Guest.  Thank you for staying with us at Best Western Plus Orange County Airport and taking time out of your busy schedule to review us on TripAdvisor.   It is our top priority to provide clean, comfortable accommodations with  basic amenities like Complimentary WiFi access in the room. We are happy to know that you enjoyed our Complimentary Hot Breakfast in the morning. The free breakfast in the morning was better than average, with staff waiting to cook something for

Complimentary breakfast was great with a choice of cold or hot.  A small coffee maker, and microwave in the room was a great plus for us, since we didn't have transportation, and the lobby shop had a variety of foods to take back to the room.  We were there on a legal matter, which my presence was required at an attorney's office, so this was a no frills trip, but the hotel arranged our very early (4:30 am) cab ride back to the airport. The rooms had outside entrances so that might be a deterrent for some, but for me that is not a big deal.  The TV was horrible however, so they need to upgrade that area for sure - the TV was one I had in my basement 15 yrs ago so it should be time.  The proximity to John Wayne airport was a selling point, so all in all I got what I wanted from the place.  The price was no deal, but I guess Orange county hotels near the airport can overcharge without worry.

The cleanliness of the room was average.  We were on the 2nd floor and was awakened early in the am from the people staying in the room right above us as they were walking backing & forth. Great place to stay..

The breakfast was nice but the breakfast area was beyond crowded, it was better just to eat on the patio or go back to the room. Overall a very nice stay though, we would consider returning.

Rather than waste my time talking to him,  I immediately gathered my things. left, and checked out.  While checking out he told me I could talk to management when they arrived at 9:00am, however, I had no intention of staying in a room with bedbugs.  If you plan on staying here do not stay in room 224.

As all our rooms have fully encased bed bug proof zippered mattress and box-springs protector, our rooms are free from bed bugs. We strive to provide the best possible service and the cleanest rooms to all our guests and take every steps to ensure that happens.

I stayed at Hyatt the next night and to think these two hotels are on the same scale is ludicrous. The beds were comfortable and the rooms were clean, but this hotel is not quite there. The hotel has made various improvements to arrrive at that level, but they are not there yet. Old TVs and no bell service. Breakfast was a nightmare. I've never seen so many angry senior citizens. Breakfast was more than expected....in addition to regular fare, they have four cook to order options for a complete breakfast!  The pool area was pleasant and the jacuzzi was warm and soothing.  The AAA rate was $73, a great bargain.  I would not hesitate to stay here again.

I have found the Best Western Plus locations to be generally quite good--decent sized room, microwave and fridge in the room, free internet and breakfast, all of which are things I look for when traveling. They serve you a hot breakfast everyday where you choose from a menu of 4 options.  Fruit, cereal and breads come with it too.  We asked for a quiet room on the 3rd floor and that is what we got.  Free wi-fi in room, a nice pool, exercise room....  Gets a little noisy during the day with airplanes overhead, but we were out and about then. I was a little disappointed in the use of plastic and styrofoam for everything (plates, bowls, cups etc.). The hotel is situated in a hotel compound (so it's quiet) fairly close to the airport, and there is a free shuttle. But no real restaurant options within walking distance.  Staff were always friendly, though housekeeping was not consistent failing to empty trash etc. Bathroom and sink were basic (no shaving mirror), free wifi worked well, room seemed large but stuffed with furniture (table & sofa in addition to bed plus a fridge and a microwave). Pool and hot tub were clean.

I would stay there again in a heartbeat!

Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback and comments.

For example you will get FREE breakfast(not continental), FREE wifi and FREE parking.  When you consider the cost of those additional items this hotel offers you a great value.  It is far enough away from Disneyland to be a quiet retreat, yet close enough to be a short 15 minute drive.  This is a great property and I would highly recommend it to anyone.  My only caution is you will need a car if you stay here.  The shuttle can take you to a limited number of locations.  But, overall this is a great deal for your money.
